premise_source_doc_sentence: Eric Singer  (  born Eric Doyle Mensinger ; May 12 , 1958  )  is an American hard rock and heavy metal drummer , best known as a member of Kiss , portraying The Catman originally played by Peter Criss .

premise_source_doc_sentence: After the first Badlands album , drummer Eric Singer left the band to join KISS , and was replaced by drummer Jeff Martin , who had previously sung lead vocals in the bands Surgical Steel and Racer X.
